title: Faster reporting on FixMyStreet: start your report with a photo
content: A new feature has been released for FixMyStreet giving users the option to start their reports with a photo, the data from which can be extracted to speed up the reporting process. As well as making the reporting process quicker, this new functionality should also increase the accuracy of reports, removing the need for usersâ€¦
creator: Sally Bracegirdle
